Table of Contents

Class ArticleTaggedEventArgs

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Events
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Event arguments for the OnArticleTagged event. Carries data related to an article being tagged, including the article and tag details, who applied the tag, and optional information about the rule and confidence.

public class ArticleTaggedEventArgs : EventArgs
Inheritance
object

Constructors

ArticleTaggedEventArgs(int, int, string, string, int?, double?)

Initializes a new instance of the ArticleTaggedEventArgs class.

public ArticleTaggedEventArgs(int articleId, int tagId, string tagName, string appliedBy, int? ruleId = null, double? confidence = null)

Parameters

articleId int

The unique identifier of the article that was tagged.

tagId int

The unique identifier of the tag that was applied.

tagName string

The name of the tag that was applied.

appliedBy string

The identifier of the entity or user who applied the tag.

ruleId int?

The optional unique identifier of the rule that triggered the tagging.

confidence double?

The optional confidence score associated with the tag application.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if tagName or appliedBy is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if articleId or tagId is less than or equal to 0.

Gets the identifier of the entity or user who applied the tag.
